entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TypeResults metadata are not inferred for API Controllers #44988
  • Support Declarative Shadow DOM in Razor/Blazor files #44986
  • [WIP] ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 8 #44984
    8.0
  • MapBackgroundJob for Minimal APIs #44983
  • Blazor compatibilty with Wisej using custom elements #44982
  • net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #44981
  • Perf improvement: json, single_query #44980
  • Limit Buffering in ConnectionHandler while forwarding Data? #44975
  • Allow Blazor components with [Parameter] attributes on properties to be aware of the required modifier. #44974
  • TypedResults method no exist HttpContext #44970
  • UseHttpsRedirection: A post request on http redirects to get #44967
  • DefaultAuthenticationConfigurationProvider has new dependency on IConfiguration #44966
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM app fails to launch with 7.0 runtime and 6.0.10 packages #44963
  • ASPNetCore v7.0.0 failing to build: Missing NuGet's #44962
  • Invalid SignalR version with blazor server #44961
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Program.cs throws exception with Serilog log path #44958
  • Blazor @bind:after not working on .NET 7 RTM release #44957

Closed

  • Blazor JS Interop is bugged in an hard to reproduce scenario. #44927
    Backlog
  • PersistentComponentState: large state will crash the client, unable to recover #44935
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 7 #39504
    7.0.0
  • Regression, Blazor WASM OIDC login callback to not sent to the requested page #44973
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #44923
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext_actix #44924
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #44931
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #44948
  • No cleanup of rootcomponent #44928
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Visual Studio Application Insights (Visual Studio only) feature not working at all #44938
  • Github Actions Azure App Service Deployment Says Successful, But Nothing Deploys .Net 6.0 #44896
  • Dispose references when performing js-to-blazor interop #44960
  • Blazor Server Razor Component hides the Exception caused by Dispose() #44965
  • AzureAD.WebSite.csproj and CreateDefaultBuilderApp.csproj don't exist in AspNetCore.sln #31436
  • Blazor WASM, Unhandled exception rendering component: ExpectedStartOfValueNotFound on login after published #44934
  • ASP0014: Suggest using top level route registrations #44959
  • GeneratePackageOnBuild with TypeScript throws error #44911
  • Using an expression to set a @on{EVENT}:preventDefault value in an SVG throws exception when expression changes from true to false #25297
    Backlog
  • Rate Limiting: Support for multiple policies on the same endpoint #44907
  • Build VS redist package for ANCM #36513
    7.0.0
  • Request features for request and response byte sizes #44953

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `Excepted` -> `Expected` typos in repo #44989
    area-blazor, 8.0-MQ
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44987
    area-runtime
  • Bump socket.io-parser from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #44985
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/7.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #44978
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44977
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Remove workaround for crashing analyzer in globalconfig #44941
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fixed a concatenation issue in special URIs. #44968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44887
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #44947
    tell-mode, 6.0.12
  • source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44842
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #44964
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `394fc42` to `727c0ed` #44815
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] nit: Update `$(RepositoryUrl)` #44891
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove VS feeds #44876
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44720
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Bump loader-utils from 2.0.0 to 2.0.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #44939
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #44949
  • Update branding to 2.1.39, merge internal commits #44951
    tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • [6.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2041219 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22556.1 #44925
    area-infrastructure
